name: Shaken, Not Purred
description:
Combat Action: When your active character is Diona, equip this card.
After Diona equips this card, immediately use Icy Paws once.
When your Diona, who has this card equipped, creates a Cat-Claw Shield, its Shield points +1.
(You must have Diona in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
descriptionraw:
$[K1]: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[A1102]</color>, equip this card.
After $[A1102] equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>$[S11022]</color> once.
When your $[A1102], who has this card equipped, creates a <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C111021]</color>, its $[K6] points +1.
(You must have $[A1102] in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
descriptionreplaced:
<color=#FFFFFFFF>Combat Action</color>: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>Diona</color>, equip this card.
After Diona equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>Icy Paws</color> once.
When your Diona, who has this card equipped, creates a <color=#FFFFFFFF>Cat-Claw Shield</color>, its {SPRITE_PRESET#4007}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Shield</color> points +1.
(You must have Diona in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
storytext: Shake and stir till its all evenly mixed... and there! Your refill's ready!
source: Reward for inviting Diona to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives
